name: Book of friends
short_description: Book of friends is a web application offering seamless document browsing, real-time availability checks, and easy reservations with email notifications. Administrators enjoy comprehensive inventory management and reservation tracking.
detailed_description: Book of friends is a web application designed to cater to the needs of a fictional small library that offers a diverse range of media, including books, comics/manga, movies, and albums. The application allows the subscriber to view a document and check its availability and reserve an item if it's not already reserved or waiting to be picked. Users must be logged in to reserve a document or register if they do not have an account, once they reserve a document an email is sent to the assigned email when the document is ready to be picked. For the administrator, it allows him to consult, modify, add, delete a document and view the list of the documents that have been reserved.
